thethingy Since you have placed this Torrent, MSHIT has officially Black Listed the Activation Via Phone. (Not your Fault) But seeing how there is no Outlook 2007 PK included & you can not find one on the bay. Could you or anyone add a valid PK (needed to Activate with Valid serial.) Actual Instructions...MSO.DLL

1. Install any Office 2007 app. 

2. Enter the Serial (not a trial serial).

3. Copy the mso.dll to;

C:Program FilesCommon Filesmicrosoft sharedOFFICE12

4.Replace file when prompted

5. Open the Office 2007 Application you have just installed.

6. Click Activate by Phone. Pick your Country.

7. Fill all of the empty boxes with zeros so it looks
like this: 00000-000000-000000-000000-000000-000000 

9. Click Activate. and it will tell you it's activated.
Really once again Thanx for all your commitment to P2P.
